entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early this evening. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
